com.facebook.litho.stats

Class LithoStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.stats.LithoStats

  • public final class LithoStats
extends Object
    Provides global counters about Litho internals. Useful for performance analyses.

    • Method Detail

      • getAppliedStateUpdates

        public static long getAppliedStateUpdates()
        Returns:
        the global count of all applied state updates (async, lazy and sync) that have happened in the process.

      • getStateUpdatesSync

        public static long getStateUpdatesSync()
        Returns:
        the global count of triggered synchronous state updates that have happened in the process.

      • getStateUpdatesAsync

        public static long getStateUpdatesAsync()
        Returns:
        the global count of triggered asynchronous state updates that have happened in the process.

      • getStateUpdatesLazy

        public static long getStateUpdatesLazy()
        Returns:
        the global count of triggered lazy state updates that have happened in the process.

      • incrementAppliedStateUpdatesBy

        public static long incrementAppliedStateUpdatesBy(long num)
        Increment the count of all applied state updates by .
        Returns:
        The new total number of all state updates recorded.

      • incrementStateUpdateSync

        public static long incrementStateUpdateSync()
        Increment the count of triggered synchronous state updates (by one).
        Returns:
        The new total number of synchronous state updates recorded.

      • incrementStateUpdateAsync

        public static long incrementStateUpdateAsync()
        Increment the count of triggered asynchronous state updates (by one).
        Returns:
        The new total number of asynchronous state updates recorded.

      • incrementStateUpdateLazy

        public static long incrementStateUpdateLazy()
        Increment the count of triggered lazy state updates (by one).
        Returns:
        The new total number of lazy state updates recorded.
